mapper.insert: insert into manager (mgID, name, Sex, roleID, State, City, Address, Password, Tel, COMMENT) values (#{mgid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sex,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{roleid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{comment,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update manager set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Sex = #{sex,jdbcType=INTEGER}, roleID = #{roleid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, State = #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER}, City = #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Tel = #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COMMENT = #{comment,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where mgID = #{mgid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select mgID, name, Sex, roleID, State, City, Address, Password, Tel, COMMENT from manager
